Storage read permission is needed to pick files.
Storage write permission is needed to save the image.
To schedule a post to run on interval like every saturday or any specific date using scheduling

PlacePoint connects people looking for 
things to do with the businesses
providing those services. The live feed
section contains information directly
from the businesses in real time, giving
you instant in one central place. In the
 near future we will be expanding to
 include many more categories.
Please select category from the
 bottom menu to continue.
No flash posts available at the moment

Rules: Flash Deals MUST be exclusive to PlacePoint & there must be a discount of 20% or higher. There is zero commission taken for running a flash deal and everyone with the PlacePoint app will get a notification on their phone that a deal is available.

Flash Deals are heavily discounted deals from businesses. Dont worry if you just see expired deals, we have several deals most weeks and as long as the app is installed you will get an instant notification when a deal is available.

Placepoint has a live feed of activities & events from businesses in your town. Select a category then switch between business listings and the live activity feed tabs to keep up to date with whats going on in your town.
Chat with the Jivo support team

Restricted Feature 
Free users do not have access to the following features: 
1 - Create Posters (Web Only)
 2 - Schedule Posts
 3 - Flash Deals
 4 - Featured Listings on Homepage
 5 - Prominent placement in category view
 6 - Competitions (coming soon)
 7 - Featured Business of the week promotion
 8 - Unlimited Relevant Categories (Restricted to 2 max) 
Please upgrade the Package to avail unrestricted access across the platform.
